txt.en:
You have retrieved a piece of paper written by the hand of a dwarf. As you read the scrap of paper, it becomes clear that you have waylaid a messenger of Angmar.

'...it is with dire urgency that I travel to your land. The forces arrayed against us are too great. We must form an alliance, if the Dourhands and Angmar are to survive....'

Reading this grave news, it becomes clear that this must be shown to someone in Gath Forthnír immediately.

'You have found what? This is dark news indeed if the Dourhands have come to pledge themselves to Angmar. We must not let this happen.

'You have taken a key first step by defeating Angmar's messenger, but we must not let the Dourhands continue to remain here. We must stop this alliance at all cost!

'I think I have a plan....'
'I am sorry, I would help you if I could, but without the parchment you speak of, there is little I can do.'
You have found a scrap of paper indicating that the Dourhand dwarves and Angmar seek to strengthen their alliance.
Speak to someone at Gath Forthnír who would know about these pledges.

Someone in Gath Forthnír will surely be interested the information you uncovered.\n\nYou have acquired information about Angmar's allies and plans. You should immediately inform someone of this development.
